org.deeplearning4j.ui.flow

Class FlowIterationListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.ui.flow.FlowIterationListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IterationListener

    public class FlowIterationListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements IterationListener
    This IterationListener is suited for general model performance/architecture overview PLEASE NOTE: WORK IN PROGRESS, DO NOT USE IT UNLESS YOU HAVE TO
    See Also:
